messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Choosing foods
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/21/2004 1:15:24 PM Eastern Daylight Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: Elissa wrote that, and it s wonderful. Well shucks
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/21/2004 1:15:24 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
Elissa wrote that, and it's wonderful.

Well shucks Ma'am! My cheeks are rosy!
(I'm in a weird timewarp log cabin - sorry)


And whether their choices are "good" or not in the beginning,

In rereading that post, I was reminded that their choices probably didn't
change much, but MY OWN vision was altered, in a much more loving way. I stopped
seeing the "bad" choices and was much more open to the logical healthy way
they made decisions for themselves.
Elissa Jill
Life's challenges are not supposed to paralyze you;
They're supposed to help you discover who you are.
~Bernice Johnson Reagon


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
